params.name: oDocument
params.description: a Component.js or *fiorisandboxconfig*.json  file to be used to preview in the sandbox

params.name: oWindow
params.description: a window object; if provided, url will be started in this window

params.name: sUrl
params.description: the actual URL to the folder containing the component.js of the SAP Fiori application, potentially containing URL parameters

params.name: sAdditionalInformation
params.description: additional information as returned in the ResolveLink service, e.g. SAPUI5.Component="com.sap.fiori.epm.MyComponent", see SAP Fiori launchpad documentation

params.name: oDocument
params.description: a valid document within your project, used to extract the base URL

params.name: oWindow
params.description: a window object; if provided, url will be started in this window
